channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Bargain Hunt
channel.desc: Today's teams are trying to bag the bargains at an antiques centre in Long Marston, Warwickshire. David Harper's reds push for that extra pound discount, while Danny Sabastian's blues lose track of the time! Christina Trevanion heads to nearby Uttoxeter and gets lost in a collection that clearly demonstrates what happens when a passionate collector just can't stop collecting!
